name: policy_exists_rls_disabled
title: Policy Exists RLS Disabled
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) policies have been created, but RLS has not been enabled for the underlying table.
detail: Table \`public.research_group_members\` has RLS policies but RLS is not enabled on the table. Policies include {"Group owners can manage membership","Members can view group membership","Users can join groups"}.

name: policy_exists_rls_disabled
title: Policy Exists RLS Disabled
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) policies have been created, but RLS has not been enabled for the underlying table.
detail: Table \`public.research_groups\` has RLS policies but RLS is not enabled on the table. Policies include {"Anyone can view research groups they are members of","Authenticated users can create research groups","Group owners can delete their groups","Group owners can update their groups"}.

name: rls_disabled_in_public
title: RLS Disabled in Public
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) has not been enabled on tables in schemas exposed to PostgREST
detail: Table \`public.research_groups\` is public, but RLS has not been enabled.
